description: The City of Raleigh's fiscal year 2016 proposed with fiscal year 2015 adopted budgets as a comparison. The final adopted 2016 budget will be voted on in a June council meeting.

metadata.description: The City of Raleigh's fiscal year 2016 proposed with fiscal years 2012-2015 adopted budgets as a comparison. The final adopted 2016 budget will be voted on in a June council meeting.

name: FY16 Proposed Expense Budget
